mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT id, school_name as schoolName, address, area, LEVEL as level, school_nature as schoolNature, canteen_mode as canteenMode, ledger_type as ledgerType, level2, parent_id as parentId, license_main_type as licenseMainType, license_main_child as licenseMainChild, school_area_id as schoolAreaId, department_master_id as departmentMasterId, department_master as departmentMaster, department_slave_id as departmentSlaveId, department_slave as departmentSlave , department_head as depHeadName , department_mobilephone as dhnMobilePhone FROM t_edu_school WHERE stat = 1 and reviewed = 1
